description: Kualifikasi : Pendidikan Minimal S1 Akuntansi /Keuangan. Pengalaman minimal 1 tahun sebagai Staff Accounting. Menguasai Microsoft Excel dan perangkat lunak akuntansi lainnya. Disiplin, Teliti, dan memiliki kemampuan komunikasi yang baik. Penempatan kerja di Kota Denpasar Bali. Jobdesc : Membantu Chief Accounting untuk review atas seluruh akun Neraca maupun Rugi Laba sebelum aktivitas closing. Melakukan rekonsiliasi atas akun-akun neraca untuk mengupdate file tersebut sebagai lampiran kesatuan pelaporan Laporan Keuangan, dilaporkan dalam 1 folder file kepada Chief Accounting. Closing pembukuan bulan berjalan sesuai prosedur tutup buku dan deadline yang telah ditentukan. Mengupdate laporan asset dan mengkoordinir opname asset, berkoordinasi dengan bagian GA di Dep. Operasional. Memastikan bahwa semua transaksi telah terjurnal dan telah sesuai dengan standar secara accounting report yang berlaku. Membantu pengembangan/update sistem program yang digunakan sampai dengan output hasil laporan. Menjaga kerahasiaan Perusahaan baik lisan maupun data-data yang tertulis.

description: BaliEasy is building a travel ecosystem and digital services platform. We started with products like eSIMs for tourists in Bali, and we’re now expanding to support global travelers by offering a range of services, not just in Bali, but around the world. Now, we're inviting builders like you to be part of our early team. If you're someone who can build with intention, move fast, and care about product quality, we want to work with you. Responsibilities Develop custom WordPress websites from scratch based on user and business needs Build custom WordPress themes that are scalable and performance-optimized Create and maintain custom plugins tailored to specific functionality Integrate websites with third-party APIs and ensure smooth data exchange Build reusable code and libraries for future use Ensure high-performance and availability and managing all technical aspects of the CMS Qualifications Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Computer Science Proven experience in developing WordPress websites from scratch Comfortable building both custom themes and plugins Experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript/jQuery, and WordPress PHP functions Familiar with Custom Fields (e.g. ACF) Experience integrating with APIs and handling dynamic data Bonus: Experience working with SEO teams or understanding SEO technical requirements Able to work independently and thrive in a small, fast-moving team Good documentation habits and communication skills (English or Bahasa Indonesia) Why Join Us? Be one of the early team members building something that scales Competitive salary Full Remote, Bali-based is a plus Paid annual leave from day one + sick leave Friendly and dynamic work environment
